channel.title: Map Bug and Redstones helps please!
channel.description:
Ok well I am using bluur's client. Don't come here to post to tell me not to use...
I have seen the fix before but I can't search it because I need to be able to search something 4 letters or longer and mapbug comes up with nothing.
So.. I suck at clients and I don't know how to fix the map bug, where when you rotate the map it does a square thing.
For the Redstones (I think there called that, correct me if I'm wrong) when I click one of them it makes a blue background around the thing not red, also when I click clanchat it highlights ignore list. Please help.
Picture for both: For the map bug you can't really see it but it cuts stuff out like it's doing to the magic shop. [IMG]http://i1010.photobucket.com/albums/af221/KeeganMac/bugs.png[/img]

item.title: Map Bug and Redstones helps please!
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


^That should fix it so when you click on the clanchat button, the clanchat redstone appears, not the ignore list.

Read full topic
item.source: Map Bug and Redstones helps please!
